What we do

INDUS Technology, Inc. is a premier provider of quality professional services for industry and government.

Our Company is synonymous with outstanding people, who take pride in partnering with our customers to provide quality services that are responsive, innovative and cost effective.

Engineering and IT

  • Range Systems O&M
  • Test & Evaluation, Weapon Systems Assessment
  • Submarine Imagery, EW, & C5I Systems Repair
  • Logistics & Supply Support
  • Information Assurance and Cyber Security
  • IT, Network O&M and Applications Development
  • MK 30 Underwater Targets O&M
  • Test, Handling, Support Equipment O&M
  • Shore Communications Systems Engineering
  • Inventory and Warehouse Management
  • Configuration Management
  • Help Desk Services
  • SATCOM Communications Services
  • Engineering Assessments and Technical Analysis
  • IA/RMF

Program Management and Command Staff

  • Management Reports and Documentation Preparation
  • Public Affairs and Protocol
  • Security Admin and ESS Office/Foreign Disclosure and Visits
  • HQ Facilities Management
  • Workforce Optimization Support
  • Manpower and Military Affairs Management
  • Graphics/CAD Support
  • Systems Design Center Support
